Blog shows
Dr. Toast Live @ The Toast Expo
posted July 12, 2011

Saturday, July 16, 12:00pm - 3:00pm, 221 11th St, San Francisco (@ Howard)

From the Facebook event:

Toast Expo is the second installment in a not-so-serious annual festival concerning food+drink as a creativity medium.

live music sets

Dr. Toast
Fellow toast enthusiast and musician on False Profit Records. His latest release 'Gravity is Quiet' just came out last week.
Listen here: http://drtoast.bandcamp.co​m/

alphazed
Post-global electronic composer/violinist.
Listen here: http://soundcloud.com/alph​azed

bring something to share
* Make Bread
* Make Jam
* A toast-inspired Project/Performance
